name: phq9_en
title: Patient Health Questionnaire-9
description: The PHQ-9 is a 9-item self-report measure used to screen for depression and monitor the severity of symptoms over the past two weeks. It's based on the DSM-IV criteria for major depressive disorder.
disclaimer: This questionnaire is for informational and self-monitoring purposes only and does not constitute a diagnosis of depression. Only a qualified mental health professional can provide a diagnosis.
source: Developed by Drs. Robert L. Spitzer, Janet B.W. Williams, Kurt Kroenke and colleagues. Available at phqscreeners.com

questions.title: Little interest or pleasure in doing things?
Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?
Feeling tired or having little energy?
Feeling bad about yourself—or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?
Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television?
Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite—being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving a lot more than usual?
Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way?

interpretation.label: Minimal or no symptoms of depression reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a low level of reported depressive symptoms. Continue monitoring your well-being.

interpretation.label: Mild symptoms of depression reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a mild level of reported depressive symptoms. Consider engaging in self-care activities and continued self-monitoring.

interpretation.label: Moderate symptoms of depression reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a moderate level of reported depressive symptoms. You may find benefit in exploring professional support.

interpretation.label: Moderately severe symptoms of depression reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a moderately severe level of reported depressive symptoms. It is strongly recommended that you consider consulting a mental health professional.

interpretation.label: Severe symptoms of depression reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a severe level of reported depressive symptoms. It is highly recommended that you seek immediate consultation with a mental health professional.
